message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CL

The paper presents a novel approach for creating, recognizing and visualizing documents in air using a Myo-armband. This involves converting hand movements into a sequence of x, y coordinates on a 2D Cartesian plane and using deep learning for recognition. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) as the paper focuses on the interaction between humans and computers. The paper also involves computer vision (cs.CV) for visualizing the hand movements and deep learning (cs.LG) for recognition. Information retrieval (cs.IR) could also be a possible sub-category as the paper involves recognizing characters in a document. Finally, natural language processing (cs.CL) could be another possible sub-category as the paper involves recognizing handwritten characters.
